title: Cordless LED Lighted Height Adjustable Floor Stand Mirror 5X/1X - Model: LEDFL45
description:
Zadro’s LED Lighted Vanity Mirror with Rechargeable Battery and USB Port parallels technology and convenience.  The rechargeable battery allows the mirror to be completely cordless and can be moved anywhere to accommodate your daily routine! Additionally, while getting ready, the USB port offers a convenient charging station for your electronic devices .  The LEDs illuminate your face at any angle and consume up to 70% less energy than regular bulbs. This vanity mirror features dual magnifications, 10X and 1X, and has 360º+ degree endless rotation, allowing you to adjustable the mirror to your perfect viewing position!  The LED Lighted Vanity Mirror with Rechargeable Battery and USB Port features a large, high quality round vanity mirror with optical quality glass, mounted on an elegant pedestal with a luxurious Satin Nickel finish.

•  USB Port for Charging Devices
•  LEDs Consume Up to 70% Less Energy Than Regular Bulbs
•  10X/1X Magnifications
•  360º+ Endless Mirror Head Rotation
•  9” Dual Sided Mirror with Optical Quality Glass
•  19” Tall
•  Rechargeable Battery (Included) & AC Adapter (Included)

transcripts: Cutting edge technology meets elegant design with Zadro's LED lighted cordless floor mirror. The cordless LED lighting floor mirror comes fully assembled and is designed for maximum illumination and performance. It is fully height adjustable, allowing for use while sitting or standing, extending for 53 inches. to 72 inches tall. The cordless LED lighted floor stand mirror features a height adjustable clasp shelf which is great for keeping your beauty supplies well at hand. Below the glass shelf, you will find four hooks for hanging towels for any other bathroom and beauty accessories. To continue the customization, this mirror also features 360 degree endless rotation. This dual sided oval mirror is made with optical quality glass and has dual magnifications. On one side, the one time magnification is perfect for all around hair styling cosmetics and beauty and every beauty need in between. On the other side, five time magnification is great for touch ups, detail, and make up application. The ON/OFF switch is located at the top of the neck. Our cordless LED lighted floor stand mirror uses eco-friendly LEDs that consume up to seventy percent less energy than regular bulbs. Because of the energy saving LED technology, the height adjustable floor mirror is completely cordless, allowing you to move it anywhere you like. It require's 4d batteries or an optional AC power adapter which is included. This must have floor mirror comes in a a luxurious [inaudible]
